name: nfbid
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: nfxfrd(s0, w0, wb(w1, w2), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wb(w1, w2), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wb(w1, w2), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1))))

body.origin: |- wb(wb(w1, w2), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1))))

stmt.origin: nfand(s0, w0, wi(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1))

body.origin:

-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wi(w2, w1)))

body.origin:

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wi(w2, w1)))

-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))

body.origin:

comment: If in a context ` x ` is not free in ` ps ` and ` ch ` , then it is not free in ` ( ps <-> ch ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 29-Dec-2017.)
